Package ru.curs.lyra.kernel

Kernel classes for Lyra.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FieldAccessor
    Abstract Lyra form field getter/setter.
    GridRefinementHandler  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicCardForm<T extends ru.curs.celesta.dbutils.BasicCursor>
    Base Java class for Lyra card form.
    BasicGridForm<T extends ru.curs.celesta.dbutils.BasicCursor>
    Base Java class for Lyra grid form.
    BasicLyraForm<T extends ru.curs.celesta.dbutils.BasicCursor>
    Base Java class for Lyra forms.
    LyraFieldValue
    Значение поля, передаваемого в форму и обратно.
    LyraFormData
    A serializable cursor data represention.
    LyraFormField
    Lyra form field metadata.
    LyraFormProperties
    Lyra form properties.
    LyraNamedElement
    Lyra named element (field or field value).
    LyraNamedElementHolder<T extends LyraNamedElement>
    An analogue of NamedElementHolder for LyraNamedElement.
    RefinementScheduler
    Schedules and executes grid refinement tasks in separate thread.
    RefinementTask
    Task for asynchronous grid refinement.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LyraFieldType
    Тип сериализуемого поля формы.
